QuestData.Title: Head Games
QuestData.Description: <Kurzel rips a long strip of material from her blouse and hands it to you.>$b$bHere, $r, take this. Dip it in the remains of Novos the Summoner.$b$bWe're going to figure out what makes the Scourge leaders tick.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kurzel wants you to use Kurzel's Blouse Scrap at the corpse of Novos the Summoner, then take the Ichor-Stained Cloth to her inside Drak'Tharon Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: Hopefully we can find somebody willing to examine this sample.
